Gapminder analysis

updated

updates 2 from testname

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
library(tidyverse)
gapminder::gapminder_unfiltered  |> 
  group_by(year) |>
  filter(lifeExp == max(lifeExp)) |>
  ungroup() |>
  select(year, country, lifeExp) |>
  arrange(year) ->
  sumdat
```
